title: Keyboard Shortcuts
description: Speed up your live coding workflow with these keyboard shortcuts

tip.title: Pro Tip
tip.description: Use Ctrl+Enter or Ctrl+U frequently during live coding to hear your changes instantly. Ctrl+P lets you quickly stop everything when needed.

keybindings.title: Editor Keybindings
keybindings.description: You can change editor keybindings in Settings:

platform.mac: On Mac, use Cmd instead of Ctrl for all shortcuts
